td.content: s:pt c/o 7 weeks h/o mild epigastric pain. NKDA. pt is a 28 YO white m. denies any alcohol use he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life o:Height 187 cm, Weight 70.6 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild tenderness to deep palpitation a:Ulcers p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed NEXIUM - 40 mg daily, and ordered serum helicobacter pylori assay.
